sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT FILE_NAME_ARCHIVE,OUTPUT_PATH  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_TEMP_FILE WHERE STATUS = ''S'' AND FILE_TYPE = ''',pipeline().parameters.FILE_TYPE,''';')

@concat('SELECT COALESCE(TRIM(FILE_LINE)+''|''+TRIM(ERROR_MSG),TRIM(FILE_LINE)) AS FILE_LINE  FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_TEMP_FILE_DETAIL WHERE FILE_ID IN(SELECT FILE_ID FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_TEMP_FILE WHERE STATUS = ''S'' AND FILE_TYPE = ''',pipeline().parameters.FILE_TYPE,'''  AND FILE_NAME_ARCHIVE = ''',item().FILE_NAME_ARCHIVE,''')  ORDER BY FILE_LINE ')

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_REVIEW 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	REVIEW_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.FILE_TYPE,''',
	''E'',
	''Config ',if(startswith(variables('configErrorMsg'),','),substring(variables('configErrorMsg'),1,sub(length(variables('configErrorMsg')),1)),variables('configErrorMsg')),' Data not found.'');')

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	FILE_TYPE,
	FILE_NAME,
	FILE_NAME_ARCHIVE,
	FILE_PROCESS_TIME,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) OUTPUT INSERTED.FILE_ID  
	VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.FILE_TYPE,''',
	''',pipeline().parameters.fileDatName,''',
	''',variables('fileNameArchive'),''',
	''',variables('fileProcessTime'),''',
	''O'',
	''insert arpu detail'');')

@concat('UPDATE
	',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''S''',
	', FILE_NAME_ARCHIVE =''',variables('fileNameArchive'),
	''', FILE_PROCESS_TIME = ''',variables('fileProcessTime'),
	''' WHERE FILE_ID =''',variables('tempFileDatId'),''';')

@concat('UPDATE
	',pipeline().parameters.SCHEMA,'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
	SET LAST_UPD = CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),''')
	, LAST_UPD_BY = ''',
	pipeline().parameters.CREDIT_USER,
	''', STATUS = ''E''',
	' WHERE FILE_ID =''',variables('tempFileDatId'),''';')

source.sqlReaderQuery: select * from CREDIT.CC_CURRENT c where c.LOV_TYPE= 'CC_MONITOR_MASTER' and c.LOV_NAME = 'sff_cc_review_cl_res' and c.ACTIVE_FLG ='Y';
